Lookup table defining source tables used by universal_identifier_resolution table.
Lookup table defining legacy MSSQL source tables used by legacy lookup and other related tables and fields.
Lookup table defining tanbits MSSQL source tables used by tanbits lookup and other related tables and fields.

Support foreign key relationships to multiple input tables similar to ref logic in elixir codebase. Actual IDs are generated using node/module specific generators that use node id and module id + acc to avoid lock contention related to the auto_increment feature.

column.name: source_identifier
column.remarks: foreign id of record on source table

column.name: source_uuid
column.remarks: foreign id of record on source table

column.name: source_identifier
column.remarks: foreign id of record on source table

column.name: legacy_sub_identifier
column.remarks: to differentiate between specific elements pulled from a single source, such as multiple images moved to the image table from a record with multiple image columns

column.remarks: foreign id of record on source table

column.name: tanbits_sub_identifier
column.remarks: to differentiate between specific elements pulled from a single source, such as multiple images moved to the image table from a record with multiple image columns
